Notes: Assign uses a KeyPath which is really nice and useful. RxSwift needs a Binder / ObserverType to bind to.
AnyPublisher has an initializer with an anonymous closure, similar to Observable.create
Publishers.Once has an initializer that takes an Error
Could be achieved with composition - replaceEmpty(with: publisher).switchToLatest()
There’s no replay or scope in Combine. Could be “faked” with multicast.
RxSwift uses Schedulers. Combine uses RunLoop, DispatchQueue, and OperationQueue.
Combine has a TimeGroupingStrategy.byTimeOrCount that could be used as a window.
